show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content: On Todayâ€™s Connect the Dots, PRN host, green health journalist, and Huffington reporter Alison Rose Levy... <!--more--> (www.healthjournalistblog.com and @alisonroselevy) speaks with Jill Stein, the likely Green Party Presidential candidate for the 2012 election about the Green New Deal, and how we can initiate the policies our society needs via electoral politics.
